author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>
description: Core JavaScript library for the Neuron Organic Object Description Language (NOODL)
name: noodl-core

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r source-map-support/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts" "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:file: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r source-map-support/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts"
